summary: Diff adds a TanStack Router multi-page frontend with Home/Categories/Cart/Notifications/Account/FAQ/Contact routes, a brand name/logo editor stored in localStorage, product data with required categories and ₹ pricing (including Methi range), carousel components, a cart provider persisted to localStorage, mobile bottom navigation, and placeholder Notifications/Account/FAQ/Contact pages. Some requirements cannot be fully verified from the truncated diff, notably the full verbatim Brand Story and presence of required generated images under the specified public assets path.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a "Brand Story" section on the Home page using the provided narrative text (verbatim, with appropriate paragraph formatting) and make it visually prominent.
missing_requirements.reason: HomePage shows an "Our Story" section with narrative paragraphs, but the file is truncated and the shown story ends mid-flow; cannot confirm the full provided story text is included verbatim and not truncated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required generated product images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in product cards.
missing_requirements.reason: Product data references images under /assets/generated/*, but the diff summary does not show any added files under frontend/public/assets/generated (asset files may be in omitted files, but cannot be confirmed from provided diff).
evidence: File diff summary notes: "Omitted files due to limits: added=6"

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity / actor integration wired into the app (InternetIdentityProvider, useActor) despite authentication being a stated non-goal for this build.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists third-party authentication (Internet Identity) as a non-goal; the diff includes Internet Identity hooks/provider and an actor hook.

hallucinated_features.description: Notifications page includes promotional/offer and delivery-update content (e.g., "Get 10% off on orders above ₹500").
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-9 only asks for simple placeholders; adding marketing/offer mechanics/content is beyond what was requested (though still consistent with a placeholder page).
